SEARCH
Package assignmentevaluator.classloader

Class AssignmentClassLoader

java.lang.Object
java.lang.ClassLoader
assignmentevaluator.classloader.AssignmentClassLoader
public class AssignmentClassLoader extends ClassLoader
A custom ClassLoader implementation that dynamically loads classes from a specified directory. This class is useful for evaluating assignments or loading classes that are not available in the standard classpath.

The AssignmentClassLoader attempts to load the class from the specified directory first. If the class cannot be found in the directory, it delegates the loading process to the parent ClassLoader.

    • AssignmentClassLoader

      public AssignmentClassLoader(File assignmentDirectory)

      Parameters:
      assignmentDirectory - the root directory containing the class files to be loaded. Must not be null.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if assignmentDirectory is not a directory or does not exist.

  • Method Details

    • loadClass

      public Class<?> loadClass(String className) throws ClassNotFoundException
      Loads the class with the specified name. The method first attempts to load the class from the directory specified during the creation of this class loader. If the class is not found in the directory, it delegates the loading process to the parent class loader.
      Overrides:
      loadClass in class ClassLoader
      Parameters:
      className - the fully qualified name of the class to be loaded.
      Returns:
      the Class object representing the loaded class.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the class cannot be found in the specified directory or the parent class loader cannot load it.
